name: ViruVerse
description:
This game was made in 2 days for the CPES game jam 2 using Godot

The Theme was Broken World

The Team (THE BOYS) :-
1 - 3boood_pro (Programmer)
2 - Fatman (Artist)
3 - Hazemation (Musician)

The Controls :-
WASD => Movement
Shift => Dash
Left Mouse Button => Attack

The idea :-
you opened your pc and surprised with a virus in it
the virus is ruinig your pc like adding characters and their weapons
from another games! and you have to stop the virus
